name: paperboy_2000
text:
Ray looked at a book he has.

You know, if you're going to spend two hours on the can, you may want to take your books and grapes in there with you and multi-task.

Is it unhygenic to rinse grapes when you're on the can? Can you lose your A rating for that?

name: carlyle
text: Where would you rinse your grapes? Unless you had a long reach to the sink.

name: falseprophet
text: When Little Nephew creates a character, he doesn't just play him, he becomes him.

name: tekende
text: Ray did not look at a book someone else had.

text: Nor did he read a book he had.  Its not even stated if he gets past the cover.  He just... looks.

text:
